programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Fishy Force / Superhero Training Day - Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. // To prepare for their first big TV interview, Fishy Force trains to be just like their favorite comic book heroes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Giant Skateboard - When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Gym - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep714
programme.desc: Pickleworld! - It's Pickleworld! The coolest, most pickle-riffic theme park in ALL of Axle City. Too bad Pickle's family got lost on the way there! In their briniest adventure yet, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to rescue the family and bring them back to the park.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Adventure Camp / Colour Drain - Adventure Alex is holding an adventure camp but the Twins are super competitive and want to win ALL the badges. // Kai invents a gardening gnome to help Jade plant flowers but it malfunctions and drains colours from the forest.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Fins in the Water - Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Home Sweet Sharkdog - Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and its up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep510

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops / Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking. // Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day - Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars!
